definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: Bostonian education cause is matchless in USA.
sentences.chinese: 波士頓的教育事業在美國首屈一指。

sentences.english: Most Bostonian choose to watch the firework on TV at home.
sentences.chinese: 老波士頓人都選擇貓在家裏看電視轉播。

sentences.english: In New England, if we except a circle of Bostonians, this has been especially true.
sentences.chinese: 在新英格蘭，撇開波士頓人的圈子不論。

sentences.english: Have an authentic Italian dinner in the North End.
sentences.chinese: 到波士頓北邊品嚐義大利道地晚餐。

sentences.english: So this is one of the local channels here around Boston.
It was around the corner from BPD headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 球場是在波士頓警察局總部的拐角處。

sentences.english: However, CSFB still refused to accept the bonds.
sentences.chinese: 然而，第一波士頓銀行仍拒絕接受債券。

sentences.english: The shoe stylings of Boston's Kevin Garnett.
sentences.chinese: 鞋風格的波士頓的加內特。

sentences.english: A conductor, especially of an orchestra, a band, or a choral group.
sentences.chinese: 小澤征爾將指揮波士頓樂團演奏貝多芬第九交響曲。

sentences.english: Bostonians' reserved demeanor had bothered him for years.
sentences.chinese: 多年來他一直對波士頓人靦腆的性格耿耿於懷。

sentences.english: And here it's, we're pretty much in Boston which is a city,
sentences.chinese: 但是在這裏，波士頓是一個大城市。

sentences.english: He alone moves poetry north of Boston.
sentences.chinese: 他一個人把詩歌帶去了波士頓北部。

sentences.english: and when we run in Boston, we have to train in the really, really cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 在波士頓的時候，我們在冒着嚴寒訓練。

definition: Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
Washington (name)/George Washington (1732-1799), first US president/Washington, US State/Washington, D.C. (US federal capital)
United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
